description:
The U.S. podcaster and Trump supporter Ben Shapiro, who has joked that Canada is “a silly country” that should be annexed, is among the American influencers that Alberta Premier Danielle Smith considers to be “allies” to Canada. The premier’s remarks came during her speech to a conservative audience at the Canada Strong and Free Network […]

The post Danielle Smith Says Trump Supporter Ben Shapiro Is Among Canada’s ‘Allies’ appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Danielle Smith Says Trump Supporter Ben Shapiro Is Among Canada’s ‘Allies’
